Today in County Clare, we're seeing solid surf at 10 ft @ 13s W with a fresh 16 mph SSW wind. Best spots include Crab Island and Doolin Point, both offering good windows throughout the day. Tomorrow, conditions drop to 12 ft @ 13s W but with fresh onshore winds making it poor across the board. The day after continues the trend with 6 ft @ 10s W and stronger winds, keeping it blown out. Best: today.
